title: Could you get Elementalist Lux from a Crate?
body: Just by playing you get crates for playing right? What's the chance of getting Elementalist Lux?

replies.body: can riot games pliz gift me spirt guard udyr or elemist lux pliz or riot are jst being greedy n dont want to gift me rp

New skins available through the store can appear in hextech crafting, but not right away.  Hextech content for new skins usually appear a few hours after the store release, and I've seen cases where players try to unlock the content too soon.  I'd say wait about a day just in case.  Good luck!
